ComicInfo.Title: The Death of a Puppet!; Let's Face It!; The Pitchman!; A Sight for Sore Eyes; The Dead Men
ComicInfo.Summary:
A puppet master is apprehensive when his performances of a puppet murder mystery seem to coincide with real killings.
When a man develops pills that can take twenty years off one's age, an older actor threatens him with violence unless he hands them over. The man tells the actor not to take any of the pills because he is only "half finished," but the actor doesn't listen, and winds up with a face that is half aged and half young.
A gag story about a conman who actually does sell the Brooklyn bridge.
A man is taken to an unorthodox surgeon who transplants a second pair of eyes into his forehead in order to correct his vision.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Authorized A. C. M. P. Conforms to the Comics Code
ComicInfo.Penciller: Jim Mooney,Joe Orlando,Bob Brown,Pete Tumlinson,Fred Kida,Jim Mooney,Joe Orlando,Bob Brown,Pete Tumlinson,Fred Kida
ComicInfo.Inker: Jim Mooney,Jack Abel,Bob Brown,Pete Tumlinson,Fred Kida,Jim Mooney,Jack Abel,Bob Brown,Pete Tumlinson,Fred Kida
